title: A 10 minute walk:  Episode 74
content:encoded:
Nottinghamshire, England October 1983. Colette Aram was a 16 year old trainee hairdresser when she made the 10 minute walk to see her boyfriend one Sunday night. But she never arrived.

In this episode of the UK True Crime Weekly Podcast we examine what happened to Colette and the brave fight for justice fought by her family.

Suport our sponsor:   enconmist.com/uktruecrime
